feed.title: Some Day Peg: A crazy two-way peg bridging BTC to other chains Raw

entry.title: Some Day Peg: A crazy two-way peg bridging BTC to other chains Raw
entry.summary: Robin Linus, a member of the Bitcoin community, shared an interesting but not-so-serious attempt to implement a two-way peg in Bitcoin Script. This can be accessed through the link provided in his message.
